p: An altogether different emphasis occurs in the PA and the SDGs. In the PA, “nationally determined contributions” are the most recurrent formula. The related national “climate actions” are meso-level responses to “climate change”. The general focus on the member States that are Parties to the Agreement (PA, preamble) points to the meso-level as the document’s normative focal system. Also the SDGs “will respect national policy“(SDGs, 21). The implementation process outlined by this agenda entails consistency “with the rights and obligations of States under international law“(SDGs, 18) and “national ownership“of the means for SD (SDGs, 46, 66, 74, 76).
